TitleEnglish: A Nobody's Way Up to an Exploration Hero
SummaryEnglish: Kaito Takagi, a low status high schooler, your typical Mob character so to say, was just a normal everyday explorer who hunted slimes every day in the dungeons that appeared in Japan, earning pocket money while admiring his childhood friend, the class queen, from afar. One day, a golden slime he had never seen appears before him. After he defeats it, he obtains an extremely rare item worth hundreds of millions as a drop, a servant card that can summon mythical beings!! After he makes up his mind and summons it, a warrior maiden with unparalleled beauty appears. Rise above being just a mob explorer Kaito!
Aliases: The Story of an Exploration Hero Who Has Worked His Way Up from Common People
Heroic Exploration Tale Starting from Mob

1.TitleEnglish: This Nobody Will Become a Hero
1.SummaryEnglish: Kaito is a frail boy who hunts slimes on the uppermost level of the city's dungeon. One day, he finds and defeats a glowing slime that leaves behind a very special card, changing Kaito's life forever.

2.SummaryEnglish: Kaito has achieved great success with his new servant and even dares to venture into the second level. However, it doesn't quite sit well with him that he cannot rely on his own strength.

3.TitleEnglish: The Viscount-Class Devil and Sylphy's Concerns
3.SummaryEnglish: Kaito has found a new servant card, and this time it's a demoness. Her bold and demanding nature surprises him and seems to meet resistance from Sylphy.

4.SummaryEnglish: Kaito's now seeing diminishing returns on the experience he's getting from the monsters on floor 3, so he makes the decision to brave the floors beyond... totally unsuspecting of what he's about to find there.

5.TitleEnglish: Attempting the 7th Floor! And a Date?!
5.SummaryEnglish: Kaito decides to take part in a dungeon event to get to know some other explorers, but he's going to have a hard time explaining that to his usual party! Meanwhile, on the surface, Haruka works up the nerve to ask Kaito... out shopping?

6.SummaryEnglish: Kaito tries to convince his servants to let him form a different group. His new partners have big goals as well, and he needs to prepare for them.

7.SummaryEnglish: Kaito takes Haruka to an open campus event at Ouka Academy, where they meet up with Airi and the rest of her party. Can Kaito manage to take a hint about how Haruka's feelings on the dungeon, much less anything else?

8.SummaryEnglish: Kaito and the girls take on floor 9 for the first time, where they're in for one nasty surprise after another.

9.SummaryEnglish: Kaito and his friends join Airi at her family estate for a study session that takes a fun turn. Afterward, Kaito's party takes another stab at floor 9 and tests out the various new powers they've acquired to great success.

10.SummaryEnglish: Kaito and his friends learn the truth about Hikari's condition.

11.SummaryEnglish: Kaito pushes himself beyond his physical limits in order to find the elixir.

12.SummaryEnglish: Kaito confesses to Haruka that he is afraid of going back into the dungeon. Haruka encourages him, and suddenly, Kaito gets an idea!
